title: My toughs about player behaviour, and a suggestion.
body:
Dear LoL Support, fellow summoners!

Let me introduce myself: Im Peter from Hungary, 24 yrs old, paramedic as a living.
I like to play this game, I play 99% ranked (SoloQ, Silver II, ended Gold V last, and my first ever season), sometimes i play with my friends, and we make a fair team, we have nice games together. I Main support ( any coincidence with my job? :) )

When im finished with my 12 or 24 hour shift, I start a soloQ match, to have a little bit of fun. And often I find out after 10, or 20 mins of gaming that my playmates do not share my behaviour with the gameplay. The toxic community (camping afk botlane, typing Ez after a 4v5 game, blaming others even if there is no reason to, buying troll items, or even not trying hard in ranked and so on.) is literally driving me crazy. 
I DONT WANT TO start the game with /mute all. I want to express my joy when my jungler comes rigth in time, when the toplaner pings in time when his/her laner teleports to bot etc. When I get a good compliment I find out that why i keep playing this game, and I want others to feel it too. I apriciate that, when after a good game my adc thanks my help, and ofter honours my work. But i literally can't stand the tiniest flame, toxiciy, negative behaviour. I Dont think punishing somebody will help in the future, not even banning.

I Would like to play an exclusive soloQ with optimistic, tryharder, good mentality summoners. Even if I would have to wait 5-6 minutes to start a game.

I considered a lot of times to stop playing only becouse of the community. I Think the support role contains more the warding, pinging, zoning etc, I believe that we need to improve our teammates mood, and with that improve our chance to win. But no matter what I do, i can't break through a tilted players imaginary barrier covered with anger.

I accept that every player has bad days, bad hours, bad plays, when im over 2 beers, when im not in my maximum skill to play (Tired, angry, etc) i dont play ranked. I would like to see the same from my fellow playmates.

Sorry for long post, for my english, and there is no potato.

replies.body:
Like can feel for you. Also a support main and every promo i have at lease one person is sitting either feeding their ass off because they don't know how to play the most basic champion or trolling.

One game about 2 mins into a game my mid goes afk for 5 mins because they feel like noodles then comes back to lane and feeds
